Interface GameSrvrIntfc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameServer

    public interface GameSrvrIntfc
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the behaviour of an MUD server.

    • Method Summary
